Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The scenario product design and launch process steps Idea Generation IG Design Draft DD Technical Feasibility Check TFC Cost Evaluation CE Prototype Creation PC Laboratory Testing LT User Testing UT Approval Gate AG Marketing Plan MP Final Launch FL

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: propose some typical DECLARE constraints meaningful for this process typical constraints existence of each activity init case starts with Idea Generation response if Design Draft then Technical Feasibility Check precedence Technical Feasibility Check precede Cost Evaluation succession chainresponse immediate etc noncoexistence

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: existence each core steps must occur at least once exactly one Approval Gate init case must start with Idea Generation absence IG at most one responded existence PC LT PC UT coexistence AG MP response DD TFC TFC CE PC LT LT UT UT AG AG MP MP FL

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: typical order design feasibility check cost evaluation prototype precedence TFC CE CE PC PC LT LT UT UT AG AG MP MP FL succession conjunction of response and precedence chainresponse immediate PC LT UT AG AG MP MP FL chainprecedence LT PC UT LT AG UT MP AG FL MP

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: pm4py DECLARE model dictionary each key constraint template value dictionary mapping activity or tuple activity1 activity2 to support confidence for unary single activity for binary tuple A B

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: support 1.0 for all confidence high values like 095 090 varied for different constraints all confidence near 1 for strong rules

Name: Validation - PE
Text: fill all required keys with plausible constraints consistent format dict with support confidence ensure syntax correct include unary binary examples for altresponse use PC LT UT etc
